prompts: Create a sleek bird Pokemon with fiery feathers and sharp talons.
Design a majestic flying creature that embodies the spirit of flames.
Imagine a Pokemon that soars through the sky with a brilliant red and black design.
Show me a fire-type avian Pokemon that hunts in the mountains and forests.
Generate a Pokemon with blazing wings and a fierce demeanor, perfect for battles.
Give me a fiery bird with a bold personality and a penchant for speed.
Make a Pokemon that represents both agility and fierce warmth in its appearance.
